name: General Override
description: Default overrides of Code Analyzers for Jendev

rules.justification: Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements. - Coding style change
Use all lowercase letters for reserved language keywords. - Miss identifying data types (Codeunit, Label, etc.)
The compilation target is set to 'OnPrem', but it must be set to 'Cloud' or 'Extension'.
Show info message about code metrics for each function or trigger - Enable
